## Source: amazon-inspector (367b2689b7d50c48e26747ef1edce3a36165d64fd361ad3fc19f1c52fce204f9)
The package ssf-desktop-api-openfin was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (6a641904e1fe3a33fe1ddea5bcc5957b07b18b66993e5ee85f19c4b34237ea05)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'ssf-desktop-api-openfin' @ 99.99.2 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
